Pre-Game Insights: Iceland head into an encounter against Montenegro this coming Friday at Laugardalsvoellur, their first of six outings in the UEFA Nations League group phase.
The last time these two sides faced off, Montenegro came away with a 2-1 win.
Iceland join this game as number 71 in the FIFA world ranking, while visitors Montenegro are number 73.
Bookmakers favor Iceland for the win, but it could be a tight match decided by small margins.
Iceland scored an average of 1.6 goals in four matches while allowing six goals against.
Montenegro travel to their next UEFA Nations League match, averaging one goal per game in their last six matches.
